user.description: Configure the BCC API for Waste Collection.

data.service_name: Name of the service in Home Assistant
data.base_url: The URL to the BCC API, including 'dataset' and 'query' parameters
data.days_table: Name of the collection days dataset
data.weeks_table: Name of the collection weeks dataset
data.polling_interval_hours: How frequently (in hours) to poll the BCC API
data.normal_icon: The mdi: icon to use for the normal (not recycling) week entity
data.recycling_icon: The mdi: icon to use for the recycling week entity
data.alert_hours: Hours in advance of midnight on collection day to alert
data.property_number: The id number of the collection property
data.has_green_bin: True if you have a green bin for collection, else False
